conbody.p: Discussion activity can be used to engage students in a conversation among members of a group. An active discussion activity is indicated on the icons of participating students ( ).
Select a group tab and press the Discussion button to initiate this activity in the group (see ). Press Discussion button again to finish the discussion.
conbody.note: We recommend to start discussions in groups of no more than 15 students in order to minimize ambient noise and chances of feedback.
